name: Download Statusbar FT DeepDark Colors
description:
This style is for the firefox addon "Download Statusbar" 
I made this to complement well with the FT DeepDark Firefox Theme.
additional_info:
===============================
Download StatusBar
===============================
https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/download-statusbar/?src=ss [Tested with the 0.9.10 Version]
===============================
FT DeepDark Firefox Theme
===============================
https://addons.mozilla.org/fr/firefox/addon/ft-deepdark/?src=ss [Tested with the 7.3.1 Version]
===============================
Tested with Firefox 23.0.1
===============================
You can edit anything normally in the addon options except the colors. For that you'll have to edit the code. Feel free to contact me if something is wrong.

discussions.name: Can you update it for new download status bars?
